channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for TN
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for TN

item.title: Report X-2023070151
item.description:
Report X-2023070151

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-28T15:11:44+00:00

  • City: OOLTEWAH
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Sequence of events unknown due to lack of communication from sort in which incident happened. DescribePack: Package failed due to closures on contents failing to operate causing contents to leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package mitigation consisted of putting contents in an open contents bin and leaving for OB QA.

item.title: Report X-2023070148
item.description:
Report X-2023070148

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-28T15:11:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-29
  • City: NASHVILLE
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Admin found a wet UNPOP Y fiberboard box with a Class 3 diamond label on loadside. No OP-900 or Proper shipping name present on packaging. Package was removed from operations. DescribePack: Two of the four 3.78 Liter bottles lost 0.2 L of fluid due to loose cap closures. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PPE was donned, the SDS consulted, and ventilation was utilized

item.title: Report X-2023070258
item.description:
Report X-2023070258

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-22T00:38:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-22
  • City: MEMPHIS
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: spilldevgrp@fedex.com
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Package was offered to the spill office located at our hub facility located in Memphis TN when moisture and staining was seen indicating leakage from inside. Package consisted of a fibreboard box containing 13 glass bottles. Each bottle was wrapped in a plastic moisture barrier and bubble wrap was used for dunnage. It was seen one of the glass bottles was broken and allowed for .5L of UN1307 Xylenes. Package was placed in a steel salvage drum and shipper was contacted for an amended shipper's declaration for return to shipper as FedEx policy does not for international shipment of salvage packaging.

item.title: Report X-2023061585
item.description:
Report X-2023061585

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-22T00:38:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-22
  • City: NASHVILLE
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023061585 SequenceEvent: Admin discovered a wet, torn fiberboard box without diamond labels or labeling exception. Package transported to HMPA staging pallet. DescribePack: One of the three 121oz bottles lost 2 oz of product from loose cap closures. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PPE was donned, ventilation utilized, and the SDS was consulted. Package was placed in a lined and lidded tote. 2. X-2023061587 SequenceEvent: Admin discovered a wet, torn fiberboard box without diamond labels or labeling exception. Package transported to HMPA staging pallet. DescribePack: One of the three 121oz bottles lost 1 oz of product from loose cap closures. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PPE was donned, ventilation utilized, and the SDS was consulted. Package was placed in a lined and lidded tote.

item.title: Report X-2023061361
item.description:
Report X-2023061361

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-22T00:38:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-22
  • City: MEMPHIS
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: spilldevgrp@fedex.com
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: A fiberboard box with signs of release was discovered at the Memphis dangerous goods build. The spill agent found four metal jerrycans in a plastic bag inside of the fiberboard box. One of the four cans had a loose cap causing the release. All contents were placed into a steel salvage package and the shipper will be contacted for an amended declaration for movement.

item.title: Report X-2022110553
item.description:
Report X-2022110553

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-22T00:38:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2022-10-24
  • City: OOLTEWAH
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was mishandled during Preload and left at Admin table for OB QA in an open contents bin. DescribePack: Package was dropped upside down which resulted in the closures being broken/cracked. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was put in an open contents bin and left for OB QA.
